entry.title: Statistical Mechanics of the Periodic Camassa-Holm Equation
entry.summary: The paper has been withdrawn

entry.title: A Note on Closed Geodesics for a Class of non-compact Riemannian Manifolds
entry.summary: We prove the existence of multiple closed geodesics on non-compact cylindrica manifolds.

entry.title: A Lax Pair for 2D Euler Equation
entry.summary: A Lax pair for the 2D Euler equation is found.

entry.title: Multiplicity results for some nonlinear Schroedinger equations with potentials
entry.summary: We prove some multiplicity results for a nonlinear equation of Schroedinger type with potential functions

entry.title: On the biharmonic Dirichlet problem: The higher dimensional case
entry.summary: Withdrawn by authors.

entry.title: Critical functions on Riemannian Manifold wich is locally Euclidean
entry.summary: We study the existence of extremal functions on compact Riemannian manifold wich is locally Euclidean .

entry.title: Nonlinear differential equations on non-compact domains
entry.summary: We present some results in the analysis of non-compact differential equations on unbounded domains.

entry.title: A Liouville type theorem for some conformally invariant fully nonlinear equations
entry.summary: We establish a Liouville type theorem for some conformally invariant fully nonlinear equations

entry.title: A general Liouville type theorem for some conformally invariant fully nonlinear equations
entry.summary: We establish a general Liouville type theorem for conformally invariant fully nonlinear equations.

entry.title: Further results on Liouville type theorems for some conformally invariant fully nonlinear equations
entry.summary: We present some further results on Liouville type theorems for some conformally invariant fully nonlinear equations.

entry.title: Global Regularity for the Viscous Boussinesq Equations
entry.summary: The global regularity for the viscous Boussinesq equations is proved.
entry.arxiv:comment: Mathematical Methods in Appl. Sci. (in press)

entry.title: On Solvability of the Cauchy problem for the partial differential equations
entry.summary: The classical solvability of the initial-boundary problem for the Davey-Stewartson-II type system of equations is proved.

entry.title: The Median Principle for Inequalities and Applications
entry.summary: The median principle is applied for different integral inequalities of Gruss and Ostrowski type.

entry.title: Some Gruss Type Inequalities in Inner Product Spaces
entry.summary: Some new Gruss type inequalities in inner product spaces and applications for integrals are given.

entry.title: On the Schrödinger flows
entry.summary: We present some recent results on the existence of solutions of the Schr\"odinger flows, and pose some problems for further research.
entry.arxiv:journal_ref: Proceedings of the ICM, Beijing 2002, vol. 2, 283--292

entry.title: On Pecaric's Inequality in Inner Product Spaces
entry.summary: Some related results to Pecaric's inequality in inner product spaces that generalises Bombieri's inequality, are given.

entry.title: Viscosity convex functions on Carnot groups
entry.summary: We prove that any locally bounded from below, upper semicontinuous v-convex function in any Carnot group is h-convex.

entry.title: Singularly perturbed Neumann problems with potentials
entry.summary: We study the existence of concentrating solutions of a singularly perturbed Neumann problems with two potentials.

entry.title: Hypergeometric functions and the Tricomi operator
entry.summary: We show how certain hypergeometric functions play an important role in finding fundamental solutions for a generalized Tricomi operator.

entry.title: A remark on the history of Hardy inequalities in domains
entry.summary: This a very brief account of the main line of development of Hardy inequalities.

entry.title: A higher order Weierstrass approximation theorem - a new proof
entry.summary: An technically interesting proof of a known theorem.
entry.arxiv:comment: 5 pp. Part of report TRITA-MAT-1998-47 Royal Inst. of Techn. Stockholm, Sweden

entry.title: Schrodinger equation with critical Sobolev exponent
entry.summary: In this paper we study the existence of solutions and their concentration phenomena of a singularly perturbed semilinear Schrodinger equation with the presence of the critical Sobolev exponent.

entry.title: Weak Asymptotics of Shock Wave Formation Process
entry.summary: We construct an asymptotic (in a weak sense) solution corresponding to the shock wave formation in a special situation.

entry.title: On a boundary value problem in subsonic aeroelasticity and the cofinite Hilbert transform
entry.summary: We study a boundary value problem in subsonic aeroelasticity.

entry.title: Energy Estimates for Solutions of Spinodal Decomposition Problem
entry.summary: We show the global existence of smooth solutions of a nonlinear partial differential equation modeling the dynamics of spinodal decomposition in diffusive materials

entry.title: Compactness of solutions to the Yamabe problem. II
entry.summary: We study compactness of solutions to the Yamabe problem on Riemannian manifolds which are not locally conformally flat.

entry.title: Global solutions to special Lagrangian equations
entry.summary: We show that any global solution to the special Lagrangian equations with the phase larger than a critical value must be quadratic.
entry.arxiv:comment: to appear in Proc. Amer. Math. Soc

entry.title: Homogeneous Solutions to Fully Nonlinear Elliptic Equations
entry.summary: We classify homogeneous degree $d\neq2$ solutions to fully nonlinear elliptic equations.
entry.arxiv:comment: to appear in Proc. Amer. Math. Soc

entry.title: Nonlinear Partial Differential Equations of Elliptic Type
entry.summary: Course Notes on Nonlinear Partial Differential Equations of Elliptic Type given to Master students at the University of Craiova, Romania.

entry.title: Multiparameter bifurcation and asymptotics for the singular Lane-Emden-Fowler equation with convection term
entry.summary: We establish several bifurcation results for the singular Lane-Emden-Fowler equation.

entry.title: Degenerate conformally invariant fully nonlinear elliptic equations
entry.summary: We establish Liouville type theorems for degenerate conformally invariant equations.
entry.arxiv:comment: some improvements made and some typos removed

entry.title: Some multi-valued solutions to Monge-Ampere equations
entry.summary: We construct several types of multi-valued solutions to the Monge-Ampere equation in higher dimensions.

entry.title: Starshaped compact hypersurfaces with prescribed m-th mean curvature in hyperbolic space
entry.summary: We study the existence of starshaped compact hypersurfaces with prescribed m-th mean curvature in hyperbolic space.

entry.title: Boundedness commutator between Sobolev spaces
entry.summary: In this paper,we will study the boundedness properties of commutator \[ C_{f}=[ f,\Delta] \] acting from $\overset{.}{H}^{1}(\mathbb{R}^{d}) $ to $\overset{.}{H}^{-1}(\mathbb{R}^{d}) .$

entry.title: A geometric problem and the Hopf Lemma. I
entry.summary: This, and its sequel, concern some variations of a classical theorem of A.D. Alexandrov and teh Hopf Lemma.

entry.title: Critical Elliptic Systems in Potential Form
entry.summary: We discuss critical elliptic systems in potential form. We prove existence, multiplicity, and compactness of solutions.

entry.title: Sharp Sobolev Inequalities for Vector Valued Maps
entry.summary: We discuss sharp Sobolev inequalities for vector valued maps.

entry.title: Stability and Perturbations of the Domain for the First Eigenvalue of the 1-Laplacian
entry.summary: We discuss stability of the first eigenvalue of the 1-Laplacian under perturbations of the domain.

entry.title: Uniqueness of the modified Schroedinger map in H^{3/4+e}(R^2)
entry.summary: We establish local well-posedness of the modified Schroedinger map in H^s, s>3/4.

entry.title: An inverse problem for parabolic equations
entry.summary: This paper is withdrawn.

entry.title: Global wellposedness of the modified Benjamin-Ono equation with initial data in $H^{1/2}$
entry.summary: We prove that the modified Benjamin-Ono equation is globally wellposed in $H^s$ for $s\ge 1/2$.

entry.title: Navier-Stokes equations: almost $L_{3,\infty}$-case
entry.summary: A sufficient condition of regularity for solutions to the Navier-Stokes equations is proved. It generalizes the so-called $L_{3,\infty}$-case.
entry.arxiv:comment: preprint POMI 03/2005, accepted for pubilcation in JMFM

entry.title: The shape of the ear canal
entry.summary: It is proved that the measurement of the acoustic pressure on the ear membrane allows one to determine the shape of the ear $ uniquely.

entry.title: Global solutions of quasilinear wave equations
entry.summary: We show that a general class of quasilinear wave equations have global solutions for small initial data as we conjectured in an earlier paper.

entry.title: Analysis of singular solutions for two nonlinear wave equations
entry.summary: This is a Thesis submitted for the degree of Doctor Philosophiae at S.I.S.S.A./I.S.A.S.

entry.title: About nonlinear geometric optics
entry.summary: We give an idea of the evolution of mathematical nonlinear geometric optics from its foundation by Lax in 1957, and present applications in various fields of mathematics and physics.

entry.title: Some asymptotic limits for solutions of Burgers equation
entry.summary: We compute some asymptotic limits for solutions of Burgers equation with Cauchy data in $L^1(R)$.

entry.title: Riesz transforms on connected sums
entry.summary: We investigate the boundness of the Riesz transform on $L^p$ for connected sum of manifolds where the Riesz transform is bounded on $L^p$.

entry.title: Semiclassical pseudodifferential calculus and the reconstruction of a magnetic field
entry.summary: We give a procedure for reconstructing a magnetic field and electric potential from boundary measurements related to the magnetic Schroedinger operator in three and higher dimensions.

entry.title: A pseudodifferential Hormander's inequality
entry.summary: The classical Hormander's inequality for linear partial differential operators with constant coeffcients is extended to pseudodifferential operators.

entry.title: On finite energy solutions of the KP-I equation
entry.summary: We prove that the flow map of the Kadomtsev-Petviashvili-I (KP-I) equation is not uniformly continuous on bounded sets of the natural energy space.

entry.title: On Schrödinger Maps
entry.summary: We study the local well-posedness theory for the Schr\"odinger Maps equation. We work in $n+1$ dimensions, for $n \geq 2$, and prove a local well-posedness for small initial data in $H^{\frac{n}{2}+\e}$.

entry.title: Sup-Inf inequality on manifold of dimension 3
entry.summary: We prove an a priori estimate of type sup*inf on Riemannian manifold of dimension 3 (not necessarily compact).

entry.title: Low-regularity Schrödinger maps
entry.summary: We prove that the Schroedinger map initial-value problem is locally well-posed for small data in the Sobolev spaces $H^\sigma$, $\sigma>(d+1)/2$.

author.name: Alexandru D. Ionescu Carlos E. Kenig

entry.title: The Taylor series of the Gaussian kernel
entry.summary: We describe a formula for the Taylor series expansion of the Gaussian kernel around the origin of $\Rn\times\R$.

entry.title: Asymptotic Estimates for Perturbed Scaiar Curvature Equation
entry.summary: We have an idea on the influence of a nonlinear term (tending to 0) on the prescribed scalar curvature equation to have an uniform estimate.

entry.title: Sharp form for improved Moser-Trudinger inequality
entry.summary: We prove that the improved Moser-Trudinger inequality with optimal coefficient $\alpha =1/2$ holds for all functions on $S^2$ with zero moments.

entry.title: Inverse boundary value problems for the magnetic Schroedinger equation
entry.summary: We survey recent results on inverse boundary value problems for the magnetic Schroedinger equation.

entry.title: DRP scheme optimization
entry.summary: A new DRP scheme is built, which enables us to minimize the error due to the finite difference approximation, by means of an equivalent matrix equation.

entry.title: A generalization of Fueter's Theorem
entry.summary: We show that Fueter's theorem holds for a more general class of quaternionic functions than those constructed by the Fueter's method.

entry.title: Remarks on non-linear Schrödinger equation with magnetic fields
entry.summary: We study the non-linear Schr\"{o}dinger equation with time depending magnetic field without smallness assumption at infinity. We obtain some results on the Cauchy problem, WKB asymptotics and instability.

entry.title: Regularity of the solutions for nonlinear biharmonic equations in R^{N}
entry.summary: The purpose of this paper is to establish the regularity the weak solutions for a nonlinear biharmonic equation.

entry.title: Cubic Derivative Nonlinear Schrodinger has Blowup Solutions
entry.summary: This paper is painfully withdrawn.

entry.title: Shape derivative of the first eigenvalue of the 1-Laplacian
entry.summary: We compute the shape derivative of the first eigenvalue of the 1-Laplacian. As an application, we find that a ball is critical among all volume-preserving deformations.

entry.title: Solutions for a class of iterated singular equations
entry.summary: Some fundamental solutions of radial type for a class of iterated elliptic singular equations including the iterated Euler equation are given.

entry.title: Nodal solutions to quasilinear elliptic equations on compact Riemannian manifolds
entry.summary: We show the existence of nodal solutions to perturbed quasilinear elliptic equations with critical Sobolev exponent on compact Riemannian manifolds. A nonexistence result is also given.

entry.title: A regularity criterion for the dissipative quasi-geostrophic equations
entry.summary: We establish a regularity criterion for weak solutions of the dissipative quasi-geostrophic equations in mixed time-space Besov spaces.

entry.title: On a question of Landis and Oleinik
entry.summary: We answer in the affirmative a question posed by Landis and Oleinik on unique continuation of variable coefficients parabolic equations.

entry.title: Random Homogenization of Fractional Obstacle Problems
entry.summary: We use a characterization of the fractional Laplacian as a Dirichlet to Neumann operator for an appropriate differential equation to study its obstacle problem in perforated domains.

entry.title: A Uniqueness and Periodicity Result for Solutions of Elliptic Equations in Unbounded Domains
entry.summary: We proof a uniqueness and periodicity theorem for bounded solutions of uniformly elliptic equations in certain unbounded domains.

entry.title: Power series solution of the modified KdV equation
entry.summary: We prove local-wellposedness of the mKdV equation in $\mathcal{F}L^{s,p}$ spaces using the new method of M. Christ.

entry.title: Hessian estimates for the sigma-2 equation in dimension three
entry.summary: We derive a priori interior Hessian estimates for the special Lagrangian equation $\sigma_{2}=1$ in dimension three.

entry.title: On stable determination of potential by boundary measurements
entry.summary: We give new stability estimates for the Gel'fand-Calderon inverse boundary value problem

entry.title: Solution of the Pompeiu problem (II)
entry.summary: This paper has been withdrawn by the author.

entry.title: On the spectrum of the Stokes operator
entry.summary: We prove Li--Yau-type lower bounds for the eigenvalues of the Stokes operator and give applications to the attractors of the Navier--Stokes equations.

entry.title: A note on solitary waves solutions of classical wave equations
entry.summary: The goal of this work is to determine whole classes of solitary wave solutions general for wave equations.

entry.title: A Microscopic Convexity Principle for Nonlinear Partial Differential Equations
entry.summary: We establish a microscopic convexity principle for nonlinear elliptic and parabolic partial differential equations in general form.

entry.title: Geometric Characterization of Solitons
entry.summary: I show that $H^1$ solutions of the nonlinear Schroedinger equation which are incoming converge to a soliton, in the radial case.
entry.arxiv:comment: To appear in Comm in PDE

entry.title: The best constant in a fractional Hardy inequality
entry.summary: We prove an optimal Hardy inequality for the fractional Laplacian on the half-space.

entry.title: Scattering for small energy solutions of NLS with periodic potential in 1D
entry.summary: We prove scattering for small solutions to of nonlinear Schroedinger equations in 1D with a space periodic potential

entry.title: Elliptic Equations Involving Meausres
entry.summary: We present the moste recent results dealing with the theory of semilinear elliptic equations with measures data
entry.arxiv:journal_ref: Stationary Partial Differential equations, Volume 1, M. Chipot, P. Quittner (Ed.) (2004) 593-712

entry.title: On semilinear elliptic equations with global coupling
entry.summary: We consider nonlinear elliptic equations which contains global coupling as a nonlinear term. We classify the existence of all possible positive solutions to this problem.

entry.title: Classification of double power nonlinear functions
entry.summary: In this article we investigate the nature of the functions, including important double power terms which arise naturally in considering typical nonlinear Schroedinger equations.

entry.title: Échelles de temps pour l'évolution quantique à petite constante de Planck
entry.summary: We present some recent results concerning the long time semiclassical approximation .

entry.title: Very singular solutions for the thin film equation with absorption
entry.summary: Self-similar large time behaviour of weak solutions of the fourth-order parabolic thin film equations with absorption is studued.

entry.title: A note on the Neumann problem
entry.summary: In this paper we provide an application to the Neumann problem of a recent three critical points theorem.

entry.title: Pointwise estimates for the polyharmonic Green function in general domains
entry.summary: In the present paper we establish sharp pointwise estimates on the polyharmonic Green function and its derivatives in an arbitrary bounded open set.

entry.title: The module structure of the Sobolev limits
entry.summary: This paper is withdrawn because of an error in Lemma 3.1

entry.title: Hardy's Inequality from a Logarithmic Caccioppoli Estimate
entry.summary: We give a simple proof of Hardy's inequality, based on the logarithmic Caccioppoli estimate for p-superharmonic functions in several variables.

entry.title: Some remarks on singular solutions of nonlinear elliptic equations. I
entry.summary: The paper concerns singular solutions of nonlinear elliptic equations.

entry.title: Asymptotic stability of singular solution to nonlinear heat equation
entry.summary: In this paper, we discuss the asymptotic stability of singular steady states of the nonlinear heat equation in the weighted Lebesgue norms.

entry.title: Cluster solutions for the Schrodinger-Poisson-Slater problem around a local minimum of the potential
entry.summary: In this paper we consider the system in $\R^3$ \label{problemadipartenza0} -\e^2\Delta u+V(x)u+\phi(x)u=u^{p},

entry.title: Extension d'une classe d'unicite pour les equations de Navier-Stokes
entry.summary: We extend a new uniqueness result recently proved by Q. Chen, C. Miao and Z. Zhang.

entry.title: On the stability of certain spin models in 2+1 dimensions
entry.summary: We prove large-data local stability theorems for several spin models in two dimensions.

entry.title: Harmonic Hardy spaces on smooth domains
entry.summary: The objective of this paper is to characterize harmonic Hardy spaces and a boundary behavior of harmonic functions on a smooth domain in real Euclidean space.

entry.title: A miscellany
entry.summary: We present several results, including some remarks on the Hopf Lemma.

entry.title: On the Stokes problem with non-zero divergence
entry.summary: We study the strong solvability of the nonstationary Stokes problem with non-zero divergence in a bounded domain.

entry.title: Nonclassical Solutions of Fully Nonlinear Elliptic Equations
entry.summary: We prove the existence of non-smooth solutions to fully nonlinear uniformly elliptic equations.

entry.title: Uniqueness of singular solution of semilinear elliptic equation
entry.summary: In this paper, we study asymptotic behavior of solution near 0 for a class of elliptic problem. The uniqueness of singular solution is established

entry.title: Note on the Chen-Lin result with Li-Zhang method
entry.summary: We give a new proof of Chen-Lin result with Li-Zhang method.

entry.title: On a generalized Wirtinger inequality
entry.summary: In this article we discuss a generalized Wirtinger inequality.
entry.arxiv:journal_ref: Discrete and Continuous Dynamical Systems Series A 9, 5 (2003) 1329-1341

entry.title: A differential inclusion: the case of an isotropic set
entry.summary: In this article we are interested in a differential inclusion defined by an isotropic compact set.
entry.arxiv:journal_ref: ESAIM - Control Optimisation and Calculus of Variations 11 (2005) 122-138

entry.title: Notes on generalized pseudo-differential operators
entry.summary: This article explains the relationship between analytic and algebraic order in case of abstract pseudo-differential operators for a regular spectral triple.

entry.title: Group analysis for generalized reaction-diffusion convection equation
entry.summary: symmetry, group classification, differential invariants, Lie-classical method,infinitesimal criterion method, RDC equation, KPP equation, similarity solutions.

entry.title: Existece and multiplicity results for nonlinear critical Neumann problem on compact manifolds
entry.summary: we study on compact Riemannian manifolds with boundary, the problems of existence and multiplicity of solutions to a Neumann problem involving the p-Laplacian operator and critical Sobolev exponents.

entry.title: Regularity of the extremal solutions in a Gelfand system problem
entry.summary: We examine a Gelfand type system and show the extremal solutions are bounded provided we are close enough to the scalar case.

entry.title: Gradient flow structure for domain relaxation in Langmuir films
entry.summary: We describe a gradient flow structure for the inviscid Langmuir layer Stokesian subfluid model introduced recently by Alexander et al [1].

entry.title: On comparison theorems for elliptic inequalities
entry.summary: We obtain comparison theorems for non-negative solutions of quasilinear elliptic inequalities
entry.arxiv:comment: This paper is submitted in J. Math. Anal. Appl

entry.title: Threshold results for semilinear parabolic systems
entry.summary: A threshold result was proved in this paper for semilinear parabolic system with pure power type nonlinearities

author.name: Qiuyi Dai Haiyang He Junhui Xie

entry.title: Costruction of classic exact solutions for Tricomi equation
entry.summary: A formula to construct classic exact solutions to Tricomi partial differential equation. The steps to obtain this formula require only elementary resolution of a simple system of first order PDEs.

entry.title: Theory of characteristics for first order partial differential equations
entry.summary: We use the method of synthetic differential geometry to revisit the geometric reasoning employed by Lie, Klein and others in their study of partial differential equations.

entry.title: A Note on Regularity for the n-dimensional H-System assuming logarithmic higher Integrability
entry.summary: We prove Holder continuity for solutions to the n-dimensional H-System assuming logarithmic higher integrability of the solution.

entry.title: On the Dirichlet Problem Generated by the Maz'ya--Sobolev Inequality
entry.summary: We discuss the attainability of sharp constants for the Maz'ya--Sobolev inequalities in wedges, "perturbed" wedges and bounded domains.

entry.title: On the Furstenberg measure and density of states for the Anderson-Bernoulli model at small disorder
entry.summary: We establish new results on the dimension of density of states for the Anderson-Bernoulli model at small disorder

entry.title: Pointwise $C^{2,α}$ estimates at the boundary for the Monge-Ampere equation
entry.summary: We obtain pointwise $C^{2,\alpha}$ estimates at boundary points for solutions to the Monge-Ampere equation under appropriate local conditions on the right hand side and boundary data.

entry.title: Energy decay for Maxwell's equations with Ohm's law on partially cubic domains
entry.summary: We prove a polynomial energy decay for the Maxwell's equations with Ohm's law on partially cubic domains with trapped rays.

entry.title: The energy-critical defocusing NLS on T^3
entry.summary: We prove global well-posedness in H^1(T^3) for the energy-critical defocusing NLS.

entry.title: Uniqueness type result in dimension 3
entry.summary: We give some estimates of type sup*inf for equation of prescribed scalar curvature type in dimenion 3. As a consequence, we derive an uniqueness type result.

entry.title: Global $W^{2,p}$ estimates for the Monge-Ampere equation
entry.summary: We obtain global $W^{2,p}$ estimates for the Monge-Ampere equation under natural assumptions on the domain and boundary data.

entry.title: Some continuation properties via minimax arguments
entry.summary: This note is devotes to some remarks regarding the use of variational methods, of minimax type, to establish continuity type results

entry.title: Stabilization of Navier - Stokes equations by oblique boundary feedback controllers
entry.summary: One designs a linear stabilizable boundary feedback controller for the Navier-Stokes equations which is oblique to boundary.

entry.title: Stability of solitary waves for the generalized higher-order Boussinesq equation
entry.summary: This work studies the stability of solitary waves of a class of sixth-order Boussinesq equations.

entry.title: Equivariant Lefschetz formulae and heat asymptotics
entry.summary: We prove an equivariant Lefschetz formula for elliptic complexes over a compact manifold carrying the action of a compact Lie group of isometries via heat equation methods.

entry.title: Hartogs extension for systems of differential equations
entry.summary: The phenomenon of removable singularity is studied for overedetermined systems of differential equations. We show that the dimension of the characteristic variety plays a key role in the problem.

entry.title: On the radiality of constrained minimizers to the Schroedinger-Poisson-Slater energy
entry.summary: We study the radial symmetry of minimizers to the Schroedinger-Poisson-Slater (S-P-S) energy.

entry.title: Pseudospectrum for Oseen vortices operators
entry.summary: In this paper, we give resolvent estimates for the linearized operator of the Navier-Stokes equation in $\R^2$ around the Oseen vortices, in the fast rotating limit $\alpha\to+\infty$.

entry.title: Regularity for Fully Nonlinear P-Laplacian Parabolic Systems: the Degenerate Case
entry.summary: This paper studies H\"older regularity property of bounded weak solutions to a class of strongly coupled degenerate parabolic systems.

entry.title: Equivalence transformations of Euler-Bernoulli equation
entry.summary: We give a determination of the equivalence group of Euler-Bernoulli equation and of one of its generalizations, and thus derive some symmetry properties of this equation.

entry.title: Conservation laws with a nonlocal flow, Application to pedestrian traffic
entry.summary: In this note, we introduce some models of pedestrian traffic and prove existence and uniqueness for these models.

entry.title: Existence and asymptotics of fronts in non local combustion models
entry.summary: We prove the existence and provide the asymptotics for non local fronts in homogeneous media.

entry.title: On the local smoothness of weak solutions to the MHD system near the boundary
entry.summary: We prove some sufficient conditions of local regularity of the siutable weak solutions to the system of magnetohydrodynamics near the plane part of the boundary.

entry.title: On the Schrodinger maximal function in higher dimension
entry.summary: New estimates on the maximal function associated to the linear Schrodinger equation are established

entry.title: On the Lyapounov exponents of Schrodinger operators associated with the standard map
entry.summary: It is shown that Schrodinger operators defined from the standard map have positive (mean) Lyapounov exponents for almost all energies

entry.title: Multidimensional L2 conjecture: a survey
entry.summary: In this survey, we give a short overview of the recent progress on the multidimensional L2 conjecture. It can also serve as an introduction to the subject.

entry.title: Bounded States of One Dimensional Schrodinger Systems
entry.summary: In this paper, we study the existence problem of bound states of one dimensional Schrodinger system via the blow-up method.

entry.title: Boundary behavior for a singular quasi-linear elliptic equation
entry.summary: In a smooth bounded domain we obtain existence, uniqueness, regularity and boundary behavior for a class of singular quasi-linear elliptic equations.

entry.title: Sharp constants in the classical weak form of the John--Nirenberg inequality
entry.summary: The sharp constants in the classical John--Nirenberg inequality are found by using Bellman function approach.

entry.title: An explicit solution for deep water waves with Coriolis effects
entry.summary: We present an explicit solution for the geophysical equatorial deep water waves in the f-plane approximation.
entry.arxiv:comment: To appear in Journal of Nonlinear Mathematical Physics; 8 pages

entry.title: Variational problems related to some fractional kinetic equations
entry.summary: We establish the existence and symmetry of all minimizers of a constrained variational problem involving the fractional gradient. This problem is closely connected to some fractional kinetic equations.

entry.title: Borderline estimates for fully nonlinear elliptic equations
entry.summary: We prove new borderline regularity results for solutions to fully nonlinear elliptic equations together with pointwise gradient potential estimates.

entry.title: $L^p$-solvability of nonlocal parabolic equations with spatial dependent and non-smooth kernelsXiche
entry.summary: In this paper we prove the optimal $L^p$-solvability of nonlocal parabolic equation with spatial dependent and non-smooth kernels.

entry.title: A semilinear problem with a W^{1,1}_0 solution
entry.summary: We study a degenerate elliptic equation, proving the existence of a W^{1,1}_0 distributional solution.

entry.title: Smoothing estimates for variable coefficients Schroedinger equation with electromagnetic potentials
entry.summary: In this paper we develop the classical multiplier technique to prove a virial identity and smoothing estimates (in a perturbative setting) for the electromagnetic variable coefficients Schroedinger equation.

entry.title: Regularity of the extremal solutions for the Liouville system
entry.summary: In this short note, we study the smoothness of the extremal solutions to the Liouville system

entry.title: Perturbation results for some nonlinear equations involving fractional operators
entry.summary: By using a perturbation technique in critical point theory, we prove the existence of solutions for two types of nonlinear equations involving fractional differential operators.

entry.title: The Holder continuity of the swirl for the Navier-Stokes motions
entry.summary: Applying the DeGiorgi Method the Holder continuity of the swirl is proved for solutions to the Navier-Stokes equations from Lq(0,T;Lp) with 3/p+2/q < 1.

entry.title: Convergence of multiple Fourier series of functions of bounded generalized variation
entry.summary: The paper introduces a new concept of $\Lambda $-variation of multivariable functions and investigates its connection with the convergence of multidimensional Fourier series

entry.title: Uniform Convergence of Double Fourier-Legendre series of Functions of Bounded Generalized Variation
entry.summary: The Uniform convergence of double Fourier-Legendre series of function of bounded Harmonic variation and bounded partial $\Lambda $-variation are investigated.

entry.title: Exponential coordinates and regularity of groupoid heat kernels
entry.summary: We prove that on an asymptotically Euclidean boundary groupoid, the heat kernel of the Laplacian is a smooth groupoid pseudo-differential operator.

entry.title: A fractional framework for perimeters and phase transitions
entry.summary: We review some recent results on minimisers of a non-local perimeter functional, in connection with some phase coexistence models whose diffusion term is given by the fractional Laplacian.

entry.title: Nonlinear Instability Theory of Lane-Emden stars
entry.summary: We establish a nonlinear instability of the Euler-Poisson system for polytropic gases whose adiabatic exponents take value in $6/5<\gamma<4/3$ around the Lane-Emden equilibrium star configurations.

entry.title: Blow-up Rate Estimates for Parabolic Equations
entry.summary: We consider the blow-up sets and the upper blow-up rate estimates for two parabolic problems defined in a ball.

entry.title: On Blow-up of a Seimilinear Heat Equation with Nonlinear Boundary Conditions
entry.summary: This paper deals with the blow-up properties of the solutions of the semilinear heat equation

entry.title: Calcul de Wick en dimension infinie
entry.summary: We prove a result on lower bounds in large dimensions.

entry.title: Local-in-time well-posedness for Nonlinear Schroedinger equations with potentials
entry.summary: We prove the local-in-time well-posedness and the mass and energy conservation laws for a 3d cubic nonlinear Schroedinger equation with a real-valued potential.

entry.title: Standing Solitary Euler-Korteweg Waves are Unstable
entry.summary: This short note establishes instability of standing solitary waves in the Euler-Korteweg system.

entry.title: The Ljapunov-Schmidt reduction for some critical problems
entry.summary: This is a survey about the application of the Ljapunov-Schmidt reduction for some critical problems.

entry.title: Recent progress in the Calderon problem with partial data
entry.summary: We survey recent results on Calderon's inverse problem with partial data, focusing on three and higher dimensions.

entry.title: Existence and uniqueness for nonlinear anisotropic elliptic equations
entry.summary: We study the existence and uniqueness for weak solutions to some classes of anisotropic elliptic Dirichlet problems with data belonging to the natural dual space.

entry.title: Answer to the questions of Yanyan Li and Luc Nguyen in arXiv:1302.1603
entry.summary: In this note we answer the two questions raised by Y.Y Li and L. Nguyen in their note [LN2] below.

entry.title: Rossby waves trapped by quantum mechanics
entry.summary: Extended abstract for the workshop "Geophysical Fluid Dynamics " held in Oberwolfach, 17 February - 23 February 2013, to be published by the Mathematisches Forschungsinstitut Oberwolfach in the "Oberwolfach Reports" series.

entry.title: Steady fluid flow in fissured porous media with imperfect contact
entry.summary: In this paper, periodic homogenization of a steady fluid flow in fissured porous solids with imperfect interfacial contact is performed via two-scale asymptotic method.

entry.title: Transmission Eigenvalues in One Dimension
entry.summary: We show how to locate all the transmission eigenvalues for a one dimensional constant index of refraction on an interval.

entry.title: $W^{1,1}_0(Ω)$ in some borderline cases of elliptic equations with degenerate coercivity
entry.summary: We study a degenerate elliptic equation, proving existence results of distributional solutions in some borderline cases.

entry.title: Some Uniforme Estimates for Scalar Curvature Type Equations
entry.summary: We give some estimate of type sup*inf for scalar curvature type equations.

entry.title: Fractional p-eigenvalues
entry.summary: We discuss some basic properties of the eigenfunctions of a class of nonlocal operators whose model is the fractional p-Laplacian.

entry.title: Existence of Smooth Solutions of the Navier-Stokes Equations
entry.summary: In this paper, we prove existence of smooth solutions of the Navier-Stokes equations that gives a positive answer to the problem proposed by Fefferman [3].

entry.title: A symbolic calculus for Fourier integral operators
entry.summary: The paper develops a symbolic calculus for Fourier integral operators associated with canonical transformations.
entry.arxiv:comment: To appear in the CRM conference proceeding series

entry.title: Space-time holomorphic solutions of Navier-Stokes equations
entry.summary: We introduce a concept of space-time holomorphic solutions of partial differential equations and construct a meromorphic solution of Navier-Stokes equations.

entry.title: A small remark on the derivation of the plateau angle conditions for the vector-valued Allen-Cahn equation
entry.summary: We clarify a point in arXiv:1210.0231 concerning the derivation of the Plateau angle conditions for the vector-valued Allen-Cahn equation

entry.title: Homothetic variant of fractional Sobolev space with application to Navier-Stokes system revisited
entry.summary: This note provides a deeper understanding of the main results obtained in the author's 2007 DPDE paper \cite{Xiao}.

entry.title: Two-scale homogenization for a class of partially degenerating PDE systems
entry.summary: A general theory is proposed for two-scale homogenization of a class of degenerating PDE systems.

entry.title: Orbital stability of standing wavesof Bose Einstein Condensates
entry.summary: We Proveexistence, symmetry and uniqueness of standing waves of a BCE with josephson junction. We also characterize the orbit of standing waves

entry.title: Liouville Theorem for 2D Navier-Stokes equations in Half Space
entry.summary: In the paper, a Liouville theorem for mild bounded ancient solutions to the 2D Navier-Stokes equations in half space has been proven.

entry.title: Parabolic equations with rough data
entry.summary: We survey recent work on local well-posedness results for parabolic equations and systems with rough initial data.

entry.title: Bifurcation of Solutions to the Allen-Cahn Equation
entry.summary: We use Morse Homology to study bifurcation of the solution sets of the Allen-Cahn Equation.

entry.title: A sup+Cinf inequality on domain of R^2
entry.summary: We give an inequality of type sup+Cinf in dimension 2.

entry.title: Irregular shock waves formation as continuation of analytic solutions
entry.summary: This paper is devoted to the blow-up of analytic solutions with the emergence of irregular solutions.

entry.title: Hypoellipticity and Higher Order Levi Conditions
entry.summary: We study the $C^\infty$-hypoellipticity for a class of double characteristic operators with simplectic characteristic manifold, in the case the classical condition of minimal loss of derivatives is violated.

entry.title: Uniqueness for some classes of parabolic problems
entry.summary: We prove some uniqueness results for weak solutions to some classes of parabolic Dirichlet problems.

entry.title: Resolvent estimates for the magnetic Schrodinger operator
entry.summary: We prove optimal high-frequency resolvent estimates for perturbations by large magnetic and electric potentials

entry.title: Existence of $p$ harmonic multiple valued maps into a separable Hilbert space
entry.summary: The general existence of $p$-Dirichlet energy minimizing maps into $Q_Q(l_2)$ is obtained.

entry.title: A Liouville theorem for minimizers with finite potential energy for the vectorial Allen-Cahn equation
entry.summary: We prove that if a globally minimizing solution to the vectorial Allen-Cahn equation has finite potential energy, then it is a constant.

entry.title: Bellman function approach to the sharp constants in uniform convexity
entry.summary: We illustrate Bellman function technique in finding the modulus of uniform convexity of $L^{p}$ spaces.

entry.title: On the fractional Lane-Emden equation
entry.summary: We classify solutions of finite Morse index of the fractional Lane- Emden equation

entry.title: Convergence and Summability of Multiple Fourier series and generalized variation
entry.summary: In this paper we present results on convergence and Ces\`{a}ro summability of Multiple Fourier series of functions of bounded generalized variation.

entry.title: Harmonic extensions of quasisymmetric maps
entry.summary: We study the Dirichlet problem for harmonic maps between hyperbolic planes, under the assumption that the Euclidean harmonic extension of the boundary map is quasiconformal.

entry.title: An elementary proof of asymptotic behavior of solutions of $u"=Vu$
entry.summary: We provide an elementary proof of the asymptotic behavior of solutions of second order differential equations.

entry.title: Harnack inequality for degenerate and singular elliptic equations with unbounded drift
entry.summary: We prove a Harnack inequality for functions which, at points of large gradient, are solutions of elliptic equations with unbounded drift.

entry.title: An elliptic pde with convex solutions
entry.summary: Using a mixture of classical and probabilistic techniques we investigate the convexity of solutions to the elliptic pde associated with a certain generalized Ornstein-Uhlenbeck process.

entry.title: A fractional isoperimetric problem in the Wiener space
entry.summary: We introduce a notion of fractional perimeter in an abstract Wiener space, and we show that halfspaces are the only volume-constrained minimisers.

entry.title: Finite Time Stability Analysis of Non-Linear Fractional Order With Multi State Time Delay
entry.summary: Sufficient condition for the stability of a fractional order semi-linear system with multi-time delay is proposed.

entry.title: Existence and regularity of solutions in nonlinear wave equations
entry.summary: In this paper, we study the global existence and regularity of H\"older continuous solutions for a series of nonlinear partial differential equations describing nonlinear waves.

entry.title: Renormalized solutions of the 2d Euler equations
entry.summary: In this paper we prove that solutions of the 2D Euler equations in vorticity formulation obtained via vanishing viscosity approximation are renormalized.

entry.title: Nonlinear Diffusion equations in image processing
entry.summary: THis work is a survey of a few nonlinear PDE based models in image restoring.

entry.title: Boundary value problems for Willmore curves in $\mathbb{R}^2$
entry.summary: In this paper the Navier problem and the Dirichlet problem for Willmore curves in $\mathbb{R}^2$ is solved.

entry.title: Enstrophy cascade in physical scales for the 3D Navier-Stokes equations
entry.summary: An enstrophy cascade is exhibited for the Navier-Stokes equations in physical scales independently of boundary conditions under physically reasonable assumptions on the flow.

entry.title: A sharp lower bound on the polygonal isoperimetric deficit
entry.summary: A sharp quantitative polygonal isoperimetric inequality is obtained.

entry.title: On the uniqueness for the 2D MHD equations without magnetic diffusion
entry.summary: In this paper, we obtain the uniqueness of the 2D MHD equations, which fills the gap of recent work \cite{1} by Chemin et al.

entry.title: Non-polynomial entire solutions to $σ_{k}$ equations
entry.summary: For $2k \leq n+1$, we exhibit non-polynomial solutions to the Hessian equation \[ \sigma_{k}(D^{2}u)=1 \] on all of $\mathbb{R}^{n}.$

entry.title: Calderón-Zygmund estimates for stochastic homogenization
entry.summary: We prove quenched~$L^p$--type estimates for the gradient of a solution of a quasilinear elliptic equation with random coefficients.

entry.title: On defocusing coupled nonlinear Schrodinger equations
entry.summary: The initial value problem for some defocusing coupled nonlinear Schrodinger equations is investigated. Global well-posedness and scattering are established.

entry.title: Wavefront sets of convolutions of distributions with (weighted) line integral
entry.summary: In this article, we explore convolutions of distributions with distributions given by (weighted) line integration. We also explore the scattering of singularities of such convolutions.

entry.title: The general $J$-flows
entry.summary: We study the general $J$-flows. We use Moser iteration to obtain the uniform estimate.

entry.title: L'inégalité de Melin Hörmander en caractéristiques multiples
entry.summary: We prove here the Melin H\"ormander inequality for operators with multiple characteristics.

entry.title: The Harnack inequality and the Jordan-Kinderlehrer-Otto scheme
entry.summary: We establish a version of the Harnack inequality for the Jordan-Kinderlehrer-Otto scheme of the heat equation on the flat torus.

entry.title: Harnack type inequality for an elliptic equation
entry.summary: We give a sup $\times$ inf inequality for an elliptic equation.
entry.arxiv:comment: arXiv admin note: substantial text overlap with arXiv:math/0604529

entry.title: Asymptotic speed of propagation for a viscous semilinear parabolic equation
entry.summary: We characterize the asymptotic speed of propagation of almost planar solutions to a semilinear viscous parabolic equation, with periodic nonlinearity.

entry.title: Local boundary regularity for the Navier-Stokes equations in nonendpoint borderline Lorentz spaces
entry.summary: We prove local regularity up to flat part of boundary, for certain classes of distributional solutions that are $L_{\infty}L^{3,q}$ with $q$ finite.

entry.title: Remark on Wolf's condition for boundary regularity of Navier-Stokes equations
entry.summary: We prove Wolf's regularity condition up to the boundary for solutions to the Navier-Stokes equations satisfying non-slip boundary condition.

entry.title: A priori bounds for positive solutions of Kirchhoff type equations
entry.summary: This paper gives a priori estimates for the positve solutions of Kirchhoff type equation without variational structure.

entry.title: Minimality in General PDE
entry.summary: This submission has been withdrawn by arXiv administrators as it is a machine-generated paper.

entry.title: Estimates in homogenization of higher-order elliptic operators
entry.summary: Operator-type estimates of homogenization are obtained for elliptic operators of arbitrary even order equal or greater than two. Operators under consideration are non-selfadjoint with lower-order terms.

entry.title: A short proof of monotonicity formula for curve shortening flow in 3D
entry.summary: We give a rather elementary proof of a Huisken-type monotonicity formula for curve shortening flow in 3D.

entry.title: Some reflections on variational methods for partial differential inclusions
entry.summary: We discuss the application of variational methods, based on non-smooth critical point theory, to a general class of partial differential inclusions.

entry.title: Global well-posedness for one dimensional Chern-Simons-Dirac system in $L^p$
entry.summary: Time global wellposedness in L^p for the Chern-Simons-Dirac equation in 1+1 dimension is discussed.

entry.title: Weighted anisotropic Morrey Spaces estimates for anisotropic maximal operators
entry.summary: The aim of this paper can give weighted anisotropic Morrey Spaces estimates for anisotropic maximal functions.

entry.title: An existence result
entry.summary: On compact Riemannian manifold of dimension n, and under some conditions on the curvature, we have a nodal solutions for n large enough.

entry.title: An Elliptic System with Degenerate Coercivity
entry.summary: In this paper we study the existence of solutions of thedegererate elliptic system.

entry.title: On the existence of weak solutions of a thermistor system with p-Laplacian type equation: the unsteady case
entry.summary: We consider an unsteady thermistor system with a p-Laplace type equation for the electrostatic potential.

entry.title: On the $C^1$ regularity of solutions to divergence form elliptic systems with Dini-continuous coefficients
entry.summary: We prove $C^1$ regularity of solutions to divergence form elliptic systems with Dini-continuous coefficients
entry.arxiv:comment: To appaer in Chinese Annals of Mathematics (CAM)

entry.title: Sur les estimations du type sup+inf et sup*inf
entry.summary: We give some results on a priori estimates and on estimates of type sup+inf and sup*inf.

entry.title: Note sur les inegalites isoperimetriques en dimension 2
entry.summary: This text talk about the isoperimetric inequalities of Nehari, Huber and Alexandrov in dimension 2.

entry.title: Dual morse index estimates and application to Hamiltonian systems with P-boundary conditions
entry.summary: In this paper, we study the multiplicity of Hamiltonian systems with P-boundary conditions.

entry.title: Symplectic non-squeezing for the cubic NLS on the line
entry.summary: We prove symplectic non-squeezing for the cubic nonlinear Schr\"odinger equation on the line via finite-dimensional approximation.

entry.title: On global well-posedness for Klein-Gordon equation with concentrated nonlinearity
entry.summary: We prove global well-posedness for the 3D Klein-Gordon equation with a concentrated nonlinearity.
entry.arxiv:comment: Journal of Mathematical Analysis and Applications 2016

entry.title: Spherical Potential Theory: Tools and Applications
entry.summary: This paper provides an overview on tools from potential theory on the sphere and some applications in geoscience.

entry.title: Concave-convex nonlinearities for some nonlinear fractional equations involving the Bessel operator
entry.summary: We prove some existence results for a class of nonlinear fractional equations driven by a nonlocal operator.

entry.title: $C^1$ regularity of orthotropic $p-$harmonic functions in the plane
entry.summary: We prove that local weak solutions of the orthotropic $p-$harmonic equation in $\mathbb{R}^2$ are $C^1$ functions.

entry.title: Pointwise convergence of Marcinkiewicz-Fejer means of double Vilenkin-Fourier series
entry.summary: In this paper we give a characterization of points in which Marcinkiewicz-Fejer means of double Vilenkin-Fourier series converges.

entry.title: Small $\dot B^{-1}_{\infty,\infty}$ implies regularity
entry.summary: We show that smallness of $\dot B^{-1}_{\infty,\infty}$ norm of solution to $d$-dimensional ($d\ge 3$) incompressible Navier-Stokes prevents blowups.

entry.title: Mathematical Study of Scattering Resonances
entry.summary: We provide an introduction to mathematical theory of scattering resonances and survey some recent results.

entry.title: A classification result for the quasi-linear Liouville equation
entry.summary: Entire solutions of the $n-$Laplace Liouville equation in $\mathbb{R}^n$ with finite mass are completely classified.

entry.title: Asypmtotics of enumerative invariants in $\CC P^2$
entry.summary: In this paper, we give the asymptotic expansion of $n_{0,d}$ and $n_{1,d}$.

entry.title: On the global solution problem of semilinear generalized Tricomi equations, II
entry.summary: This paper is a continuation of our recent work in [9].

entry.title: Multiplicity of positive solutions for a critical quasilinear Neumann problem
entry.summary: We establish the multiplicity of positive solutions to a quasilinear Neumann problem in expanding balls and hemispheres with critical exponent in the boundary condition.

entry.title: Global weak solutions for SQG in bounded domains
entry.summary: We prove existence of global weak $L^2$ solutions of the inviscid SQG equation in bounded domains.

entry.title: Unique Continuation for Stochastic Hyperbolic Equations
entry.summary: In this paper, we derive a local unique continuation property for stochastic hyperbolic equations without boundary conditions. This result is proved by a global Carleman estimate.

entry.title: Global well-posedness for the Schrödinger map problem with small Besov norm
entry.summary: In this paper we prove a global result for the Schr\"odinger map problem with initial data with small Besov norm at critical regularity.

entry.title: Capillary surfaces arising in singular perturbation problems
entry.summary: In this paper we prove Bernstein type theorems for a class of stationary points of the Alt-Caffarelli functional in $\mathbb R^2$ and $\mathbb R^3$.

entry.title: Logarithmic Sobolev inequality revisited
entry.summary: We provide a new characterization of the logarithmic Sobolev inequality.

entry.title: Differential Equations and A-quasiconvexity
entry.summary: In this paper we extend to the abstract A-framework some existence theorems for differential inclusion problems with Dirichlet boundary conditions.

entry.title: Lifespan of strong solutions to the periodic derivative nonlinear Schrödinger equation
entry.summary: An explicit lifespan estimate is presented for the derivative Schr\"odinger equations with periodic boundary condition.

entry.title: Fundamental solutions for Schrodinger operators with general inverse square potentials
entry.summary: In this paper, we classify the fundamental solutions for a class of Schrodinger operators.

entry.title: Corrigendum : An inverse problem in corrosion detection:stability estimates, J. Inv. Ill-posed Problems 12 (4) (2004), 349-367
entry.summary: Corrigendum : An inverse problem in corrosion detection:stability estimates, J. Inv. Ill-posed Problems 12 (4) (2004), 349-367.

entry.title: A note on the convergence of almost minimal sets
entry.summary: In this paper, we will show that Hausdorff convergence and varifold convergence coincide on the class of almost minimal sets.

entry.title: On a homogenization problem
entry.summary: We study a homogenization question for stochastic divergence type operator

entry.title: Viscosity solutions and the minimal surface system
entry.summary: We give a definition of viscosity solution for the minimal surface system and prove a version of Allard regularity theorem in this setting.

entry.title: Hardy's uncertainty principle and unique continuation properties for abstract Schrödinger equations
entry.summary: In this paper, Hardy's uncertainty principle and unique continuation properties of abstract Schr\"odinger equations in vector-valued classes are obtained

entry.title: Regularity properties of nonlinear Schrödinger equations in vector-valued spaces
entry.summary: In this paper, regularity properties of Cauchy problem for linear and nonlinear abstract Schr\"odinger equations in vector-valued function spaces are obtained.

entry.title: Fractional derivative in spaces of continuous functions
entry.summary: This is a first version of a paper concerning abstract evolution equation with fractional time derivatives. Maximal regularity results in spaces of continuous and Hoelder continuous functions are described.

entry.title: Fractional Hardy-Sobolev inequalities on half spaces
entry.summary: We investigate the existence of extremals for Hardy-Sobolev inequalities involving the Dirichlet fractional Laplacian of order s, 0<s<1, on half-spaces.

entry.title: Determining a sound-soft polyhedral scatterer by a single far-field measurement
entry.summary: We prove that a sound-soft polyhedral scatterer is uniquely determined by the far-field pattern corresponding to an incident plane wave at one given wavenumber and one given incident direction.
entry.arxiv:comment: The proof of Proposition 3.2 is incomplete. Corrigendum is available through arXiv (math.AP/0601406)
entry.arxiv:journal_ref: Published in Proc. Amer. Math. Soc. 133 (2005), 1685-1691

entry.title: A note on `Nonexistence of self-similar singularities for the 3D incompressible Euler equations'
entry.summary: In this brief note we show that the author's previous result in \cite{cha} on the nonexistence of self-similar singularities for the 3D incompressible Euler equations implies actually the nonexistence of `locally self-similar' singular solution, which has been sought by many physicists.
entry.arxiv:comment: This is a brief remark on the main result of math.AP/0601060

entry.title: One Dimensional Conformal Metric Flows
entry.summary: This is the second paper of our series of papers on one dimensional conformal metric flows. In this paper we continue our studies of the one dimensional conformal metric flows, which were introduced in math.AP/0611254. We prove the global existence and convergence of the one dimensional Yamabe and affine flows. Furthermore, we obtain exponential convergence of the metrics under these flows.

entry.title: Resolvents of elliptic boundary problems on conic manifolds
entry.summary: This paper is a continuation of the investigation of resolvents of elliptic operators on conic manifolds from math.AP/0410178 and math.AP/0410176 to the case of manifolds with boundary and realizations of operators under boundary conditions. We prove the existence of sectors of minimal growth for realizations of boundary value problems for cone operators under natural ellipticity conditions on the symbols. Special attention is devoted to the clarification of the analytic structure of the resolvent.

entry.title: The Paley-Wiener Theorem for the Jacobi Transform and the Local Huygens' Principle for Root Systems with Even Multiplicities
entry.summary: This note is a continuation of the previous paper math.AP/0411383 by the same authors. Its purpose is to extend the results of math.AP/0411383 to the context of root systems with even multiplicities. Under the even multiplicity assumption, we prove a local Paley-Wiener theorem for the Jacobi transform and the strong Huygens' principle for the wave equation associated with the modified compact Laplace operator.

entry.title: Semilinear wave equations
entry.summary: We survey existence and regularity results for semi-linear wave equations. In particular, we review the recent regularity results for the $u^5$-Klein Gordon equation by Grillakis and this author and give a self-contained, slightly simplified proof.

entry.title: Global Irregularity For Degenerate Elliptic Operators
entry.summary: Examples are given of degenerate elliptic operators on smooth, compact manifolds that are not globally regular in $C^\infty$. These operators degenerate only in a rather mild fashion. Certain weak regularity results are proved, and an interpretation of global irregularity in terms of the associated heat semigroup is given.

entry.title: Infinite dimensional families of locally nonsolvable partial differential operators
entry.summary: Local solvability is analyzed for natural families of partial differential operators having double characteristics. In some families the set of all operators that are not locally solvable is shown to have both infinite dimension and infinite codimension.

entry.title: Low regularity semi-linear wave equations
entry.summary: We prove local well-posedness results for the semi-linear wave equation for data in $H^\gamma$, $0 < \gamma < \frac{n-3}{2(n-1)}$, extending the previously known results for this problem. The improvement comes from an introduction of a two-scale Lebesgue space $X^{r,p}_k$.

entry.title: Differential constraints compatible with linearized equations
entry.summary: Differential constraints compatible with the linearized equations of partial differential equations are examined. Recursion operators are obtained by integrating the differential constraints.

entry.title: Area Minimizing Sets Subject to a Volume Constraint in a Convex Set
entry.summary: In this paper we consider the problem of minimizing area subject to a volume constraint in a given convex set.
entry.arxiv:comment: 29 pages, to appear in Journal of Geometric Analysis

entry.title: Existence of weak solutions for nonlinear parabolic systems
entry.summary: Via abstract results on maximal monotone operators and compactness property of Nemickii operator, existence of a weak solution for a class of nonlinear parabolic systems of partial differential equations is proven.

entry.title: On the Grushin operator and hyperbolic symmetry
entry.summary: Complexity of geometric symmetry for differential operators with mixed homogeniety is examined here. Sharp Sobolev estimates are calculated for the Grushin operator in low dimensions using hyperbolic symmetry and conformal geometry.

entry.title: Lectures on Pseudo-differential Operators
entry.summary: This lecture notes cover a Part III (first year graduate) course that was given at Cambridge University over several years on pseudo-differential operators. The calculus on manifolds is developed and applied to prove propagation of singularities and the Hodge decomposition theorem. Problems are included.

entry.title: Global Strichartz estimates for nontrapping perturbations of the Laplacian
entry.summary: The authors prove global Strichartz estimates for compact perturbations of the wave operator in odd dimensions when a non-trapping assumption is satisfied.
entry.arxiv:comment: To appear in Communications in PDE

entry.title: On the L^2-stability and L^2 controllability of steady flows of an ideal incompressible fluid
entry.summary: The author studies the flows of an ideal incompressible fluid in a 2-dimensional domain, and in particular questions of instability and controllability.

entry.title: Navier-Stokes equations and fluid turbulence
entry.summary: An Eulerian-Lagrangian approach to incompressible fluids that is convenient for both analysis and physics is presented. Bounds on burning rates in combustion and heat transfer in convection are discussed, as well as results concerning spectra.

entry.title: Existence of minimal H-bubbles
entry.summary: We prove existence of S^2-type parametric surfaces in R^3 having prescribed noncostant mean curvature.

author.name: R. Musina
author.arxiv:affiliation: Dipartimento di Matematica e Informatica, Universita' di Udine, Udine, Italy

entry.title: On the support of solutions to the g-KdV equation
entry.summary: We discuss the question whether solutions of the initial value problem for the generalized KdV equation can have compact support at two different times.

entry.title: Global existence for a quasilinear wave equation outside of star-shaped domains
entry.summary: We establish global existence in 3+1 dimensions of small-amplitude solutions of quasilinear Dirichlet-wave equations satisfying the null condition outside of star-shapped obstacles.

entry.title: Dromion perturbation for the Davey-Stewartson-1 equations
entry.summary: The perturbation of the dromion of the Davey-Stewartson-1 equation is studied over the large time.

entry.title: On the Fu/v cik spectrum with indefinite weights
entry.summary: This paper is devoted to the study of the Fu/v cik spectrum with indefinite weights in the one-dimensional case.
entry.arxiv:comment: 19 pages, to appear in Diff. Int. Eq

entry.title: Some local wellposedness results for nonlinear Schroedinger equations below L^2
entry.summary: We prove some local (in time) wellposedness results for nonlinear Schroedinger equations with rough data, that is, the initial value belongs to some Sobolev space of negative index. The proof uses the Fourier restriction norm method.

entry.title: Fundamental Solutions for the Tricomi Operator, II
entry.summary: We explicitly calculate fundamental solutions for the Tricomi operator relative to a point in the hyperbolic region and show that these solutions originate from the hypergeometric function F(1/6,1/6;1;z).

entry.title: Lax Pairs and Darboux Transformations for Euler Equations
entry.summary: In this article, we will report the recent developments on Lax pairs and Darboux transformations for Euler equations of inviscid fluids.

entry.title: Scalars convected by a 2D incompressible flow
entry.summary: We provide a test for numerical simulations, for several two dimensional incompressible flows, that appear to develop sharp fronts. We show that in order to have a front the velocity has to have uncontrolled velocity growth.

entry.title: Two symmetry problems in potential theory
entry.summary: We consider two eliiptic overdetermined boundary value problems. There are variants on J. Serrin's 1971 classical results and having the same conclusion that the domains should be forcibly Euclidean balls.

entry.title: Semiclassical limit for nonlinear Schroedinger equations with electromagnetic fields
entry.summary: We prove some multiplicity results by means of a perturbation technique in critical point theory.

entry.title: A negative answer to a one-dimensional symmetry problem in the Heisenberg group
entry.summary: De Giorgi conjectured that bounded monotone solutions to the Ginzburg-Landau equation are constant along hyperplanes, in this paper we prove that in the Heisenberg group this conjecture doesn't hold true with respect to the center direction.

entry.title: A Multiplicity Result for the Linearschrodinger-Maxwell Equations with Negative Potential
entry.summary: In this paper it is proved the existence of a sequence of radial solutions with negative energy of the linear Schr\"odinger-Maxwell equations under the action of a negative potential.

entry.title: Regularity Results for a class of Semilinear Parabolic Degenerate Equations and Applications
entry.summary: We consider a possibly strongly degenerate parabolic semilinear problem which can be applied to a differential model for pricing financial derivatives. We prove the asked regularity for applying the Ito's formula which is used for building the differential model.

entry.title: On the uniphase steady solutions of the nonlinear damped wave equation
entry.summary: We study the steady uniphase and multiphase solutions of the discretized nonlinear damped wave equation.Conditions for the stability abd instability of the steady solutions are given;in the instability case the linear stable and unstable associated manifolds are described.

entry.title: Linearity of homogeneous order one solutions to elliptic equations in dimension three
entry.summary: We prove that any homogeneous order one solution to 3-d nondivergence elliptic equations must be linear.

entry.title: On nodal lines of Neumann eigenfunctions
entry.summary: We present a new method for locating the nodal line of the second eigenfunction for the Neumann problem in a planar domain. The technique is based on the `mirror coupling' of reflected Brownian motions.

entry.title: Isospectral Theory of Euler Equations
entry.summary: Isospectral problem of both 2D and 3D Euler equations of inviscid fluids, is investigated. Connections with the Clay problem are described. Spectral theorem of the Lax pair is studied.

entry.title: A remark on well-posedness for hyperbolic equations with singular coefficients
entry.summary: We prove some $C^\infty$ and Gevrey well-posedness results for hyperbolic equations with singular coefficients.
entry.arxiv:comment: 9 pages; to appear in "Tsukuba Jour. Math."

entry.title: The Dirichlet Problem for the Minimal Surface System in Arbitrary Codimension
entry.summary: We solve the Cauchy-Dirichlet problem for the minimal surface system in arbitrary dimension and codimension assuming a condition on the variation of the initial submanifold .

entry.title: Local well-posedness for dispersion generalized Benjamin-Ono equations
entry.summary: In this paper we study local well-posedness in the energy space for a family of dispersive equations that can be seen as dispersive ``interpolations'' between the KdV and the Benjamin-Ono equation.

entry.title: A fully nonlinear version of the Yamabe problem and a Harnack type inequality
entry.summary: We present some results on a fully nonlinear version of the Yamabe problem and a Harnack type inequality for general conformally invariant fully nonlinear second order elliptic equations.

entry.title: Entire invariant solutions to Monge-Ampere equations
entry.summary: We prove existence and regularity of entire solutions to Monge-Ampere equations invariant under an irreducible action of a compact Lie group.
entry.arxiv:comment: version 2: 4 pages; a reference added; other minor changes; to appear in Proc. AMS

entry.title: Symmetrizers and Continuity of Stable Subspaces for Parabolic-Hyperbolic Boundary Value Problems
entry.summary: In this paper we prove the continuity of stable subspaces associated to parabolic-hyperbolic boundary value problems, for limiting values of parameters. The analysis is based on the construction performed in a previous paper of Kreiss' type symmetrizers.

entry.title: Deforming convex hypersurfaces to a hypersurface with prescribed harmonic mean curvature
entry.summary: A heat flow method is used to deform convex hypersurfaces in a ring domain to a hypersurface whose harmonic mean curvature is a prescribed function.

entry.title: Existence of Chaos in Evolution Equations
entry.summary: For a general evolution equation with a Silnikov homoclinic orbit, Smale horseshoes are constructed.

entry.title: Unbounded critical points for a class of lower semicontinuous functionals
entry.summary: In this paper we prove existence and multiplicity results of unbounded critical points for a general class of weakly lower semicontinuous functionals. We will apply a suitable nonsmooth critical point theory.

entry.title: Deformation from symmetry for Schrodinger equations of higher order on unbounded domains
entry.summary: By means of a perturbation method recently introduced by Bolle, we discuss the existence of infinitely many solutions for a class of perturbed symmetric higher order Schrodinger equations with non-homogeneous boundary data on unbounded domains.

entry.title: Ambrosio-Tortorelli Approximation of Quasi-Static Evolution of Brittle Fractures
entry.summary: We define a notion of quasi-static evolution for the elliptic approximation of the Mumford-Shah functional proposed by Ambrosio and Tortorelli. Then we prove that this regular evolution converges to a quasi-static growth of brittle fractures in linearly elastic bodies.

entry.title: On a class of singularly perturbed elliptic equations in divergence form
entry.summary: We prove the existence of one or more solutions to a singularly perturbed elliptic problema with two potential functions.

entry.title: Landesman-Laser Conditions and Quasilinear Elliptic Problems
entry.summary: In this paper we consider two elliptic problems. The first one is a Dirichlet problem while the second is Neumann. We extend all the known results concerning Landesman-Laser conditions by using the Mountain-Pass theorem with the Cerami $(PS)$ condition.

entry.title: Affine maximal hypersurfaces
entry.summary: This is a brief survey of recent works by Neil Trudinger and myself on the Bernstein problem and Plateau problem for affine maximal hypersurfaces.
entry.arxiv:journal_ref: Proceedings of the ICM, Beijing 2002, vol. 3, 221--232

entry.title: Two dimensional compact simple Riemannian manifolds are boundary distance rigid
entry.summary: We prove that knowing the length of geodesics joining points on the boundary of a two-dimensional, compact, simple Riemannian manifold with boundary, we can determine uniquely the Riemannian metric up to the natural obstruction.

entry.title: The distance function to the boundary, Finsler geometry and the singular set of viscosity solutions of some Hamilton-Jacobi equations
entry.summary: We study the distance function to the boundary, Finsler geometry and the singular set of viscosity solutions of some Hamilton-Jacobi equations.

entry.title: A note on regularity of solutions to degenerate elliptic equations of Caffarelli-Kohn-Nirenberg type
entry.summary: We establish Holder continuity of weak solutions to degenerate critical elliptic equations of Caffarelli-Kohn-Nirenberg type.

entry.title: A Compactness Theorem for Homogenization of Parabolic Partial Differential Equations
entry.summary: In order to have a better description of homogenization for parabolic partial differential equations with periodic coefficients, we define the notion of parametric two-scale convergence. A compactness theorem is proved to justify this notion.

entry.title: Remark on some conformally invariant integral equations: the method of moving spheres
entry.summary: We study some conformally invariant integral equations using the method of moving spheres.

entry.title: Well-posedness for a higher order nonlinear Schrodinger equation in Sobolev spaces of negative indices
Steady state coexistence solutions of reaction-diffusion competition models
entry.summary: This paper explains the uniqueness of positive steady state of general Lotka-Volterra competition model of two species of animals in the same environment.

author.name: Joon Hyuk Kang
author.arxiv:affiliation: Department of Mathematics, Andrews University, Berrien Springs, USA

entry.title: Uniqueness of coexistence state with small perturbation
entry.summary: In this paper, we study the uniqueness of coexistence state for multiple species of animals in the same environment.

author.name: Joon Hyuk Kang
author.arxiv:affiliation: Department of Mathematics, Andrews University, Berrien Springs, USA

entry.title: Dispersive analysis of the charge transfer models
entry.summary: We prove the dispersive estimates for charge transfer Hamiltonians, including the matrix non-selfadjoint generalizations. The charge transfer models appear naturally in the study of stability of multi-soliton systems.

entry.title: N particles approximation of the Vlasov equations with singular potential
entry.summary: On demontre la convergence pour tout temps d'une approximation de l'equation de Vlasov par un systeme de particules sans regularisation du champ, ceci pour des potentiels singuliers, avec une force du type $1/|x|^{\alpha}$, pour \alpha plus petit que 1.

entry.title: A Singular Critical Potential For The Schrodinger operator
entry.summary: We construct a potential $V$ on $\RR^d$, smooth away from one pole, and a sequence of quasi-modes for the operator $-\Delta+V$, which concentrate on this pole. No smoothing effect, Strichartz estimates nor dispersive inequalities hold for the corresponding Schrodinger equation.

entry.title: Relative homological linking
entry.summary: Using Morse theory and a new relative homological linking of pairs, we prove a ``homological linking principle'', thereby generalizing many well known results in critical point theory.
entry.arxiv:comment: 10 pages; new section on homotopical linking
entry.arxiv:journal_ref: Topological methods in nonlinear analysis, Vol. 30, No. 2, December 2007

entry.title: Interior spikes of a singularly perturbed Neumann problem with potentials
entry.summary: In this paper we prove that a singularly perturbed Neumann problem with potentials admits the existence of interior spikes concentrating in maxima and minima of an auxiliary function depending only on the potentials.

entry.title: Hardy and Hardy PDO type inequalities in domains. Part I
entry.summary: The previous "Polynomial Capacities, Poincare' type inequalities and Spectral synthesis in Sobolev space" is a prerequisite. A parallell reading is recommended.
entry.arxiv:comment: 32 pp. Unpublished results mainly from the 80-ies

entry.title: Backward uniqueness for parabolic operators with non-Lipscitz coefficients
entry.summary: We investigate the relation between the backward uniqueness and the regularity of the coefficients for a parabolic operator. A necessary and sufficient condition for uniqueness is given in terms of the modulus of continuity of the coefficients.

entry.title: Fully nonlinear parabolic equations in two space variables
entry.summary: H\"older estimates for second derivatives are proved for solutions of fully nonlinear parabolic equations in two space variables. Related techniques extend the regularity theory for fully nonlinear parabolic equations in higher dimensions.

entry.title: L^p eigenfunction bounds for the Hermite operator
entry.summary: We obtain L^p eigenfunction bounds for the harmonic oscillator in R^n and for other related operators, improving earlier results of Thangavelu and Karadzhov. We also construct suitable counterexamples which show that our estimates are sharp.

entry.title: Cascade of phases in turbulent flows
entry.summary: This article is devoted to incompressible Euler equations (or to Navier-Stokes equations in the vanishing viscosity limit). It describes the propagation of quasi-singularities. The underlying phenomena are consistent with the notion of a cascade of energy.

entry.title: Stable determination of an inclusion by boundary measurements
entry.summary: We deal with the problem of determining an inclusion within an electrical conductor from electrical boundary measurements. Under mild a priori assumptions we establish an optimal stability estimate.

entry.title: A Remark on Long Range Scattering for the nonlinear Klein-Gordon equation
entry.summary: We consider the problem of scattering for the long range critical nonlinear Klein-Gordon in one space dimension.

entry.title: On some abstract version of the Cauchy-Kowalewski Problem
entry.summary: We consider an abstract version of the Cauchy-Kowalewski Problem with the right hand side being free from the Lipschitz type conditions and prove the existence theorem.

entry.title: On the scattering for the $\bar{\partial}$- equation and reconstruction of convection terms
entry.summary: In this paper we reconstruct convection terms from boundary measurements.We reduce the Beals and Coifman inverse scattering scattering formalism from a first order system to a formalism for the $\bar{\partial}$ equation.

entry.title: Inverse boundary value problems for systems of partial differential equations
entry.summary: We describe a simple way of constructing exponentially growing solutions of the second order systems with the Laplacian as the principal term.
entry.arxiv:comment: 10 pages,Proceedings of the International Conference on Inverse Problems, Hongkong,China,9-12 January 2002

entry.title: The "hot spots" problem in planar domains with one hole
entry.summary: There exists a planar domain with piecewise smooth boundary and one hole such that the second eigenfunction for the Laplacian with Neumann boundary conditions attains its maximum and minimum inside the domain.

entry.title: Detecting nonlinear corrosion by electrostatic measurements
entry.summary: We deal with an inverse problem arising in corrosion detection. We prove a stability estimate for a nonlinear term on the inaccessible portion of the boundary by electrostatic boundary measurements on the accessible one.

entry.title: b-functions and integrable solutions of holonomic D-modules
entry.summary: A famous theorem of Harish-Chandra shows that all invariant eigendistributions on a semisimple Lie group are locally integrable functions. We give here an algebraic version of this theorem in terms of polynomials associated with a holonomic D-module.

entry.title: Dispersive estimates for the three-dimensional Schroedinger equation with rough potentials
entry.summary: We prove L^1 --> L^\infty estimates for the linear Schroedinger equation in three dimensions. The potential is assumed to belong to certain L^p spaces, but no pointwise decay estimates and no additional regularity is required.
